inclusion.criterion: all women in group (A) had taken the oral contraceptive pill have done so routinely for the past three months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all women in group (B) had a normal menstrual cycle; use any other non-hormonal contraceptive method.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: their body mass index did not exceed 30 Kg/m2.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all women had a normal menstrual cycle of 25-32 days for the past 3 months.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: skeletal deformity or using assistive devices.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous surgeries at their back and/or lower limbs.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: genital and breast cancer and active liver disease.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
